p: The results of this study show that antimicrobial use commonly does not comply with current treatment guidelines in dogs with respiratory or urinary tract infections and acute diarrhea. Consequently, there is an urgent need for antimicrobial stewardship initiatives.To support the prudent use of antimicrobials in animals, antibioticscout.ch, a comprehensive online tool based on current guidelines was launched in December 2016. The impact of this tool on veterinary prescribing habits will be assessed in future studies.
